body: "The fact that Zapata’s death came about through starvation is one more piece of the hunger we have endured for over half a century": Crossing the Barbed Wire explains why Orlando Zapata Tamayo's death "was not in vain".

title: Cuba: Zapata Vive

sentence: "The fact that Zapata’s death came about through starvation is one more piece of the hunger we have endured for over half a century": Crossing the Barbed Wire explains why Orlando Zapata Tamayo's death "was not in vain".
